foreignData.name: Krabbligator
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
{6}{G/U}{G/U}: Adaptieren 3. (Falls keine +1/+1-Marken auf dieser Kreatur liegen, lege drei +1/+1-Marken auf sie.)
Solange mindestens eine +1/+1-Marke auf dem Krabbligator liegt, kann er angreifen, als ob er nicht Verteidiger hätte.

foreignData.name: Crustaceodrilo
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
{6}{G/U}{G/U}: Adaptar 3. (Si esta criatura no tiene contadores +1/+1 sobre ella, pon tres contadores +1/+1 sobre ella.)
Mientras el Crustaceodrilo tenga un contador +1/+1 sobre él, puede atacar como si no tuviera la habilidad de defensor.

foreignData.name: Crabigator
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
{6}{G/U}{G/U} : Adaptez 3. (Si cette créature n'a pas de marqueurs +1/+1 sur elle, mettez trois marqueurs +1/+1 sur elle.)
Tant que le Crabigator a au moins un marqueur +1/+1 sur lui, il peut attaquer comme s'il n'avait pas le défenseur.
foreignData.type: Créature : crabe et tortue terrestre et crocodile

foreignData.name: Alligranchio

Difensore

Fintanto che l'Alligranchio ha un segnalino +1/+1, può attaccare come se non avesse difensore.

小走りワニの上に＋１/＋１カウンターが置かれているかぎり、これは防衛を持たないかのように攻撃できる。

딸깍악어가 +1/+1 카운터를 가지고 있는 한, 딸깍악어는 수비태세가 없는 것처럼 공격할 수 있다.

foreignData.text:

{6}{G/U}{G/U}: адаптируйте 3. (Если на этом существе нет жетонов +1/+1, положите на него три жетона +1/+1.)
Пока на Краблигаторе есть жетон +1/+1, он может атаковать, как если бы у него не было способности Защитника.

name: Scuttlegator
originalText:
Defender
{6}{GW}{GW}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)
As long as Scuttlegator has a +1/+1 counter on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

rulings.text: You can always activate an ability that will cause a creature to adapt. As that ability resolves, if the creature has a +1/+1 counter on it for any reason, you simply won’t put any +1/+1 counters on it.
If a creature somehow loses all of its +1/+1 counters, it can adapt again and get more +1/+1 counters.

text:
Defender
{6}{G/U}{G/U}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)
As long as Scuttlegator has a +1/+1 counter on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.
